0.text:
Hello ma'am, sab badhiya? We have had our fair share of shenanigans and fun bro. Thanks for being there with me in my highs and lows. You know what I mean. Thanks for irritating me amd my best friend. Will try to come see you sometime but you stay in another city. Jokes aside, happy birthday Akruti. Have a sick one. And remember, the sky is the limit. A lot to see and a lot to experience in life. All the best and always be you. 
Cheers🥂
